entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
